loginPage.title: Login
loginPage.subtitle: Login with your email and password
loginPage.welcomeMessage: Log in to continue your journey toward a healthier, more balanced life.

heroSection.description: Track your vitals, book appointments, check your medical history, get reminders, find hospitals, chat with health experts, and even talk to our AI-powered chatbot – all in one place.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started with JeevaFit is simple! Follow these 3 easy steps to begin your journey.

step1.title: Step 1: Login/Signup
step1.desc: Start by creating your account or logging in to get access to all features.

step2.title: Step 2: Enter Your Info
step2.desc: Provide your basic information, including medical history, to tailor the experience.

step3.title: Step 3: Let JeevaFit Take Care
step3.desc: Jeevafit will handle everything: monitor your vitals, schedule appointments, keep your medical records, and send reminders!

finalCTA.title: Ready to take charge of your health?
finalCTA.subtitle: Join thousands who track vitals, book appointments, manage medical history, and stay on top of their health with JeevaFit.

features.title: Why Choose JeevaFit?
features.subtitle: JeevaFit goes beyond tracking — it transforms your well-being with intelligent tools, personalized care, and a user-first experience.

liveTracking.title: Live Health Tracking
liveTracking.description: Track heart rate, blood oxygen, steps, and more — synced directly from your smartwatch.

appointment.title: Appointment Scheduling
appointment.description: Let HealthMate auto-book appointments when your health metrics need professional care.

reports.title: Personalized Health Reports
reports.description: Visualize your health trends and receive insights to improve your daily lifestyle.

reminders.title: Smart Reminders
reminders.description: Get notified for medication, hydration, and physical activity — never miss a thing.

brand.title: JeevaFit
brand.description: Your intelligent companion for managing health — from vitals tracking to appointments and more.

signup.welcomeSubtitle: Start your health journey with us today.

precautions.title: Precautions
precautions.Clear: It’s a clear day! Drink water and wear sunscreen.
precautions.Rain: Carry an umbrella and avoid waterlogged areas.
precautions.Snow: Wear warm clothes and avoid slippery roads.
precautions.Thunderstorm: Stay indoors and avoid trees or metal objects.
precautions.Clouds: Stay hydrated and carry light gear.
precautions.Default: Stay cautious and check for alerts.
